name: P̵̠̆Ę̶̦̈́̑R̴̨̝͒͆Ḏ̵̥̑I̷̼̟͊T̷͇̘̍̒Ị̷̂͊O̶͚̲͆
description: PERDITIO is a semi interactive experience in a strange world made from light and shadows created under the glow of the moon goddess LU. The player takes the place of the character Lux who is an acolyte of the Moon Goddess. As an acolyte Lux has learned the ways of harnessing the light to protect the people of Buwan and using this power to attack foes with Light. The player  must traverse the world using WASD to move Lux from a first person perspective and aiming and attacking with the mouse. Through this journey Lux will face the forms of darkness forged from the void and learn the truth of the origins of their peoples' lost history.
